summary: This bill, the Restore and Modernize Our National Laboratories Act of 2025, directs the Secretary of Energy to fund projects to restore and modernize National Laboratories. These projects include addressing deferred maintenance, critical infrastructure needs, and lab modernization. The Secretary is required to submit a list of funded projects to Congress annually. The bill also amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to update the strategy for facilities and infrastructure and requires a report on the strategy's development, including a 10-year plan, funding estimates, and project prioritization.
